body_html:
you need to add a '--' after translate.py to distinguish options passed to the python script vs options passed to bazel:

bazel run -c opt <...>/models/rnn/translate/translate.py --
  --data_dir [your_data_directory]
body_text:
you need to add a '--' after translate.py to distinguish options passed to the python script vs options passed to bazel:
bazel run -c opt <...>/models/rnn/translate/translate.py --
  --data_dir [your_data_directory]
body:
you need to add a '--' after translate.py to distinguish options passed to the python script vs options passed to bazel:

```
bazel run -c opt <...>/models/rnn/translate/translate.py --
  --data_dir [your_data_directory]
```
